translations.translation: but it is not up to you whether or not he is purified.
Though it is not your concern if he should not grow (in fulness).
though you are not to blame if he would not cleanse himself.
though you will not be questioned even if he never purifies himself.
And you have nothing to lose if he does not become pure.
What does it matter to you if he will not become pure
And no blame is on you if he would not purify himself
though it is not thy concern, if he does not cleanse himself.
Yet it is not thy concern if he grow not (in grace).
though you are not to be blamed if he would not purify himself --
Whereas it is not on thee that he is not cleansed.
though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
Though it is no blame to thee if he grow not (in spiritual understanding).
What does it matter to you if he will not become pure (from disbelief, you are only a Messenger, your duty is to convey the Message of Allah).
although it is not for you to be concerned if he remained unpurified.
Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
[80:7] yet it is not your concern if he does not cleanse himself, [if he does not] believe.
(Yet it is not thy concern if he grow not (in grace)) it is not your concern if these three men do not believe in Allah's divine Oneness.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَمَا عَلَيْكَ } أي: أيّ شيء عرض عليك
 ولحِق بك عن المكاره الإمكانية { أَلاَّ يَزَّكَّىٰ } [عبس: 7] ولا يتظهر عن خباثة الآثام
 وأدناس العصيان حتى يبعثك عن الإعراض عن أهل الحق
 وعدم الالتفات نحوهم
 مع أن ما عليك إلاَّ البلاغ والتبليغ

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وما عليك ألاَّ يزَّكَّى } أي: وليس عليك بأس في ألاَّ يزَّكّى بالإسلام حتى تهتم بأمره
 وتُعرض عمن أسلم وأقبل إليك
 وقيل: " ما " استفهامية
 أي: أيُّ شيء عليك في ألاّ يزكّى هذا الكافر
